articles.title: Power restored to most in San Francisco after massive outage
articles.content: PG&E said earlier its crews were working Sunday to restore electricity in several neighborhoods and small areas of downtown San Francisco following Saturdayâ€™s outage. PG&E said it could not provide a precise timeframe for when the power would be fully restored. That fire has been blamed for some of the blackouts. The outage remains under investigation. PG&E said it has mobilized additional engineers and electricians to help with restoration efforts.
